title: FREE 1 Oz Essential Oil + Diffuser - Nature's Remedy Kate
description: This black ceramic luxury piece envelopes your room with essential oil in style. Kate's vase has a gorgeous, modern cut out design, allowing the options of warm white or colored rotating lights to beam through. Enjoy the aromatherapy mist for up to 14 hours.

Kate's vase has a gorgeous, modern cut out design, allowing the options of warm white or colored rotating lights to beam through. Enjoy the aromatherapy mist for up to 14 hours.
